User-Agent: *
Disallow: /node_modules/
Disallow: /src/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /kontakt # legacy duplicate redirect

Allow: /sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://www.antaressystems.net/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://www.antaressystems.net/rss.xml

# Bingbot-Api checksum certificate integration
BINGBOT-Checksum: 86a365d918f5c3e7632c2a9f92c0a111

# Specific directives for specific crawlers
User-Agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

User-Agent: Googlebot-Image
Allow: /*.jpg$
Allow: /*.png$
Allow: /*.svg$

User-Agent: Bingbot
Allow: /
